services.title: modern design
services.description: Your website will look stunning and function perfectly on any device - desktop, tablet, or mobile. No outdated designs, just sleek, modern, and user-friendly experiences.

services.title: comprehensive
services.description: What's the point of a website if no one finds it? We build websites with SEO best practices to help you rank on Google and attract organic traffic.

services.title: support & maintenance
services.description: A website needs updates, security checks, and tweaks to stay relevant. We offer post-launch support, troubleshooting, and maintenance so you never have to worry.

projectItems.title: Napparaten
projectItems.impact: Improved online booking efficiency, leading to a 20% increase in scheduled appointments within 3 months.
projectItems.description: Responsive WordPress site for a Stockholm-based naprapathy clinic. Highlights services, builds trust, and simplifies appointment booking.
projectItems.imgAlt: Homepage of Napparaten, a Stockholm naprapathy clinic, with clean layout, calming visuals and a prominent call-to-action to book an appointment

projectItems.title: Personal Trainer Template
projectItems.impact: Demonstrates ability to design and build a conversion-focused fitness industry site template, optimized for fast deployment.
projectItems.description: Modern Wix Studio site for a personal trainer, showcasing training programs and client results with a motivational design.
projectItems.imgAlt: Homepage of personal trainer Jon Raynor, featuring bold fitness imagery, a motivational headline and links to training services.

projectItems.title: ERP SaaS Platform - Odevo AB
projectItems.impact: Streamlined operations by reducing manual workflows by 40%, improving client onboarding speed, and enabling housing associations to self-manage content without developer intervention.
projectItems.description: Developed and maintained an internal ERP platform for property and financial management, including a customer-facing portal and a website builder for housing associations.

projectItems.title: Swedish Election Data Application - TT News Agency AB
projectItems.impact: Delivered accurate, real-time election results to national news outlets, supporting high traffic loads on election day.
projectItems.description: Full-stack web application to present and manage Swedish election data, featuring a modern UI, RESTful API, and scalable SQL database.

projectItems.title: Self-Hosted Cloud Storage - Nextcloud VPS
projectItems.impact: Improved file accessibility and collaboration while maintaining data sovereignty and security.
projectItems.description: Configured and deployed a secure Nextcloud instance on a VPS using Docker and Caddy, enabling scalable, private cloud storage.

testimonials.title: Dr. of Naprapathy
testimonials.testimonial: I hired Joe to build my website and was very satisfied with the collaboration. He worked professionally, paid attention to detail, and contributed valuable ideas throughout the process. I can highly recommend him.

testimonials.title: Project Manager
testimonials.testimonial: I had a great experience working with Joe. The project was delivered on time, and the communication throughout was clear and efficient. He made sure to include all the features I wanted without any hassle. I'm very happy with the final result and would definitely recommend his services.

experienceItems.description: Built and iterated ERP SaaS modules for property/financial management, improving workflow efficiency by 10% for internal users • Developed a website builder for housing associations with editable templates; enabled 20+ associations to launch sites with no-code tooling • Shipped portal features for errands, finances and housing services; reduced related support tickets by 5% for internal users

Developed a full-stack web application to present and manage Swedish election data for end users, improving data accessibility and user engagement • Built and maintained a relational SQL database, increasing data load speed by 10% and ensuring scalable, persistent data management

Completed an intensive 3-month full-stack JavaScript bootcamp, gaining expertise in modern web development frameworks and best practices • Hired immediately post-bootcamp as a consultant to develop and launch a full-stack web application for a major Swedish news agency, providing an end-to-end solution for presenting Swedish election results

Designed and developed custom websites for clients across industries including tech, wellness, and finance • Improved website load times by up to 40% through performance optimization and code refactoring • Delivered fully responsive, mobile-first designs ensuring consistent UX on all devices • Collaborated remotely with international clients using agile and async workflows
